Class class1 {
  description: "First Description";
  properties:
    a, a1, b required, c array, d, e, f, g, g1, g2, h,
    i, j, k, l, m, n, o, p, q, r, s, s1, s2, s3, t, x;
}
Class class2 {
  properties: y;
}

Property a { range: Boolean; }
Property a1 { range: Text; }
Property b { range: Text; }
Property c { range: Text; }
Property d { range: Url; }
Property e { range: Email; }
Property f { range: Hostname; }
Property g { range: Text regex="[a-z]"; }
Property g1 { range: Text minLength=0; }
Property g2 { range: Text minLength=0 maxLength=10; }
Property h { range: Number ; }
Property i { range: Int ; }
Property j { range: Int8 ; }
Property k { range: Int16 ; }
Property l { range: Int32 ; }
Property m { range: Int64 ; }
Property n { range: Float32 ; }
Property o { range: Float64 ; }
Property p { range: Number min=0; }
Property q { range: Number min=0 max=10; }
Property r { range: Enum values=["one", "two", 3, 4.5]; }
Property s { range: DateTime ; }
Property s1 { range: ShortDate ; }
Property s2 { range: DateTime ; }
Property s3 { range: Time ; }
Property t {
  range: NestedObject;
  properties: u, v;
}
Property u { range: Text; }
Property v { range: NestedObject; properties: w; }
Property w { range: Text; }
Property x {
  range: LinkedClass
  ref=class2;
}
Property y { range: Text; }
